åŸºæœ¬ä½¿ç”¨ #

ä¸‹é¢åˆ›å»ºhttpæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¹¶ç›‘å¬ request äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå¤„ç†ç”¨æˆ·è¯·æ±‚å¹¶å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€å“åº”ã€‚

js
import http from 'http'
//åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡
const service = http.createServer()
//å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¯·æ±‚äº‹ä»¶
service.on('request', (req, res) => {
  console.log(req.method)
  console.log(res)
  let str = `url:${req.url}, method:${req.method}`
  //å‘Šä¹‹å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ•°æ®å“åº”å®Œæ¯•
  res.end(str)
})

//ç›‘å¬ç«¯å£
service.listen(3000,'localhost', () => {
  console.log('Service: http://127.0.0.1:3000')
})

æˆ–è€…å¯ä»¥æ¢ä¸€ç§å†™æ³•ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½® http.createServer çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ¥ç›‘å¬ request äº‹ä»¶ã€‚

  res.end('daodao.com')

å¤´ä¿¡æ¯ #

å½“è°ƒç”¨ res.end() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€ä¸­æ–‡å†…å®¹çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¼šå‡ºç°ä¹±ç é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ï¼Œå¯é€šè¿‡ setHeader ä¸ statusCode è®¾ç½®å“åº”å¤´ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ‰‹åŠ¨è®¾ç½®å†…å®¹çš„ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼ã€‚

import http from 'http'
//åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡
const service = http.createServer((req, res) => {
  //è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€ç 200å¹¶æŒ‡å®šå“åº”ç±»å‹ä¸ç¼–ç 
  res.setHeader('Content-type', 'text/html;charset=utf-8')
  let str = `ä½ çš„urlæ˜¯ï¼š${req.url}ï¼Œä½ çš„methodæ˜¯ï¼š${req.method}`
  //å“åº”æ•°æ®
  res.end(str)
})

//ç›‘å¬ç«¯å£

  console.log('Service: http://127.0.0.1:3000')
})

é€šè¿‡ res.writeHead åŒæ—¶è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€ç ä¸å“åº”å¤´ä¿¡æ¯

js
import http from 'http'
//åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡
const service = http.createServer((req, res) => {
  //è®¾ç½®å¤´ä¿¡æ¯
  res.writeHead(200, {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  })
  //å“åº”æ•°æ®
  res.end(JSON.stringify({ name: 'åˆ€åˆ€', url: 'daodao.com' }))
})

//ç›‘å¬ç«¯å£
service.listen(3000, () => {
  console.log('Service: http://127.0.0.1:3000')
})

é¡µé¢è·³è½¬ #

import { createServer } from 'http'

const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  res.statusCode = 301
  res.setHeader('Location', 'https://duyidao.gitee.io/daodao/')
  res.end()
})

service.listen(3000)

è·¯ç”±åŸºç¡€ #

ä¸‹é¢æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ›å»ºç®€å•çš„è·¯ç”±ï¼Œå³æ ¹æ®è¯·æ±‚å“åº”ä¸åŒç»“æœï¼Œæ­¥éª¤å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  1. è·å–è¯·æ±‚çš„ url åœ°å€
  2. åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·è¯·æ±‚çš„æ˜¯å¦ä¸º / æˆ– /index.html é¦–é¡µ
  3. åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·è¯·æ±‚çš„æ˜¯å¦ä¸º /about.html å…³äºé¡µé¢
  4. éƒ½ä¸ç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚å“åº”å†…å®¹ä¸º 404 Not found
  5. è®¾ç½® Content-Type å“åº”å¤´ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç 
  6. ä½¿ç”¨ res.end() æŠŠå†…å®¹å“åº”ç»™å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
js
import { createServer } from 'http'

const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  const content = ''
  res.statusCode = 200
  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html;charset=utf8')
  switch (req.url) {
    case '/':
    case '/index.html':
      const = '<h1>é¦–é¡µ</h1>'
      break
    case '/about.html':
      const = '<h1>å…³äº</h1>'
      break
    case '/user.html':
      res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json') // å•ç‹¬ä¿®æ”¹è¯¥é¡µé¢çš„è¯·æ±‚å¤´
      const = '<h1>æˆ‘çš„</h1>'
      break
    default:
      const = '<h1>404 Not Found</h1>'
      break;
  }
  res.end()
})

service.listen(3000, () => {
  console.log(`host: http://localhost:3000`)
})

å“åº”æ•°æ® #

ä¸‹é¢ä»‹ç»æŒç”¨å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ•°æ®å“åº”

HTML #

é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½®å¤´ä¿¡æ¯æ¥å‘Šä¹‹æµè§ˆå™¨ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯å“åº”çš„æ˜¯ html æ•°æ®

js
import { pipeline } from 'stream'
import { createReadStream } from 'fs'
import { createServer } from 'http'

const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  res.writeHead(200, {
    'Content-type': 'text/html;charset=utf8',
  })
  pipeline(createReadStream('index.html'), res, () => {})
})

service.listen(3000)

JSON #

åç«¯åšä¸ºæ¥å£æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¼ é€’ JSON æ•°æ®ç»™å‰ç«¯

js
import { createServer } from 'http'

const user = [{ name: 'åç›¾äºº' }, { name: 'å‘å†›å¤§å”' }]

const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  res.writeHead(200, {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
  })
  res.end(JSON.stringify(user))
})

service.listen(3000)

å˜é‡è§£æ #

ä¸‹é¢æ¥æ¼”ç¤ºæ¨¡æ¿å˜é‡çš„æ›¿æ¢æµç¨‹ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆåˆ›å»ºæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶ index.html

js
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>houdunren.com</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    {{name}} æ¬¢è¿ä½ 
  </body>
</html>

ç„¶åå®ç°åå°é€»è¾‘

js
import { readFileSync } from 'fs'
import { createServer } from 'http'

const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-type': 'text/html' })

	//æ¨¡æ¿å˜é‡
  const vars = { name: 'åç›¾äºº' } as any
  //åŠ è½½æ¨¡æ¿
  const template = readFileSync(__dirname + '/index.html', 'utf-8')
  //æ›¿æ¢æ¨¡æ¿å˜é‡
  const content = template.replace(/\{\{(.*?)\}\}/gi, (match, ...args) => {
    return vars[args[0]]
  })

  res.end(content)
})

service.listen(3000, () => {
  console.log('æœåŠ¡å·²ç»å¯åŠ¨...')
})

è¡¨å•æ•°æ® #

ä¸‹é¢ä»‹ç»å¦‚ä½•è·å–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¡¨å•æ•°æ®

åŸºæœ¬åŸç† #

js
import { createServer } from 'http'

const users = [] as any[]
const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  res.statusCode = 200
  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html;charset=utf8')
  if (req.method == 'POST' && req.url == '/user') {
    req.on('data', (data) => {
      //buffer è½¬æ¢
      const user = data.toString()
      //è½¬ä¸º JSON å¯¹è±¡ä¿å­˜
      users.push(JSON.parse(user))
      req.pipe(res)
    })
  }

  if (req.method == 'GET' && req.url == '/user') {
    res.end(JSON.stringify(users))
  }
})

service.listen(3000, () => {
  console.log(`host: http://localhost:3000`)
})

åœ¨ apifox ç­‰å‘é€è¯·æ±‚

ä½¿ç”¨æ‰©å±•åŒ… #

ä½¿ç”¨ multiparty (opens new window)åŒ…è§£æå‰ç«¯éå¸¸æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œä¸‹é¢ä½¿ç”¨æµå¹¶ç»“åˆæ’ä»¶ multiparty (opens new window)æ‰©å±•åŒ…å®ç°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 

js
import { createReadStream, createWriteStream, mkdirSync } from 'fs'
import { createServer } from 'http'
import multiparty from 'multiparty'
import { pipeline } from 'stream'

const service = createServer((req, res) => {
  var form = new multiparty.Form()
  form.parse(req, function (err: any, fields: any, files: any) {
    //åˆ›å»ºç›®å½•
    mkdirSync('uploads')

    //å°†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨æµä¿å­˜æ•°æ®
    pipeline(
      createReadStream(files.file[0].path),
      createWriteStream('./uploads/' + files.file[0].originalFilename),
      (error) => {
        error ? console.log(error) : res.end('æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ')
      },
    )
  })
})

service.listen(3000)

è·¯å¾„ä¼˜åŒ– #

js
if (url === '/') {
  fPath = path.join(__dirname, '/clock/clock.html')
} else {
  fPath = path.join(__dirname, '/clock', url)
}

æ€»ä½“ä»£ç  #

js
const fs = require('fs')
const path = require('path')
const http = require('http')

const server = http.createServer()

server.on('request', (req, res) => {
  const url = req.url
  const method = req.method
  
  let fPath = ''
  if (url === '/') {
    fPath = path.join(__dirname, '/clock/clock.html')
  } else {
    fPath = path.join(__dirname, '/clock', url)
  }

  fs.readFile(fPath, 'utf8', (err, result) => {
    if(err) return res.end('404 not')
    res.end(result)
  })
})

server.listen(80, () => {
  console.log('å·²å¯åŠ¨');
})
